hero.description: InnoCode is the premier arena for developers to test their skills, compete in high-stakes algorithms, and push the boundaries of what's possible in software.

mission.title: Bridging the gap between
mission.description1: We started InnoCode with a simple mission: to create a platform where coding isn't just about syntax, but about problem-solving, creativity, and performance.
mission.description2: Whether you are a student just starting out or a senior engineer looking to stay sharp, our contests provide the perfect environment to challenge yourself.

features.title: Built for Competitors
features.subtitle: Everything you need to focus on the code.

realTimeExecution.title: Real-time Execution
realTimeExecution.description: Experience ultra-low latency code execution in isolated sandboxes supporting 40+ languages.

globalLeaderboards.title: Global Leaderboards
globalLeaderboards.description: Compete against the best developers worldwide and climb the ranks in our dynamic ELO system.

instantFeedback.title: Instant Feedback
instantFeedback.description: Get immediate insights on time complexity, memory usage, and edge case failures.

cta.title: Ready to join the leaderboard?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers solving challenges today. It's free to get started.
